title: U.S. Weighing New Sanctions on Russia’s Central Bank
sub_head: Sanctions on the central bank would be a major hit to Russia, which holds more than $600 billion in reserves
body:
The U.S. is weighing additional sanctions on Russia’s central bank as it discusses a series of increasingly severe economic penalties in response to Moscow’s invasion of Ukraine, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
The people said the U.S. hasn’t yet made a decision on whether and how to expand sanctions against Russia’s central bank, adding that the Biden administration is discussing the issue with allies in Europe.
